version_description:
Thanks for downloading WeatherPro! You can now benefit from:
•Netatmo rain gauge support: How much rain has fallen in your garden, and can you skip watering the plants today? Netatmo users who own a rain gauge can connect their account to WeatherPro, and data from their sensors will be displayed on the start screen.
•WeatherPro is now optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+ (including barometer support)
•Various bugfixes and some minor improvements have been made to keep the app up-to-date.

Your opinion is valued, so if you like the app, then please take a moment to review it.

MeteoGroup is dedicated to creating the best quality weather products and we take your feedback very seriously. Development for WeatherPro is ongoing, as we continually improve performance and enhance the usability.

If you experience any problems, please write us an email to support@weatherpro.eu. We hope you enjoy WeatherPro and thank you for your feedback!

If you experience any problems, please write us an email to support@weatherpro.eu. We hope you enjoy WeatherPro and thank you for your feedback!

• Use 3D touch gestures and Quick Actions to simplify the usage of WeatherPro on your new iPhone 6s and 6s Plus. Open a small preview of a day or hour as well as an info screen for each chosen favourite with Peek (light press) and use a single press on the app icon to choose whether you’ll directly open the weather overview, the maps or the favourites.
• We also support the new Apple Watch Complications so feel free to adjust and upgrade your watch face with the predicted temperature for your chosen location (WatchKit 2.0 required).
• We have also fixed some minor bugs which can be reported to support@weatherpro.eu.

Feel free to email us in case you experience any problems, and please rate our app in the App Store if you like WeatherPro. We thank you for your feedback!

• To enhance the usability we have restructured the app settings and the menu in the upper left corner of the weather overview. This will simplify the navigation by giving easy access to main features such as the search function, weather news, webcams etc.
• In the restructured menu users also have a direct connection to our help center via the new help button.
• We have also fixed some minor bugs which can be reported via our help center (accessible via the help button in the restructured menu within the weather overview).

Feel free to email us in case you experience any problems, and please rate our app in the App Store. We thank you for your feedback!

• To provide a better overview we improved the rain gauge design.
• We have also fixed minor bugs which were reported via our help center (accessible via the help button).

• Right on time for the Apple release, the app now supports iOS 10 and its most important features!
• For iOS 10 we implemented rich notifications so you can now easily preview our weather news from the lock screen as well as from the notification center.
• Additionally, we improved the design of the widget for iOS 10, which you can now also quickly access with 3D Touch directly from the app icon.

We hope you enjoy using WeatherPro and we thank you for any feedback!

We are excited to deliver a long-awaited update to the WeatherPro iOS app.

This release focuses on:
· Rebuilding compatibility up to the latest iOS14.5.
· Resolving a number of bugs and crashes, including deprecating unsupported features.

Introducing a new iOS14 widget with options to see daily or hourly forecasts.  Let us know your feedback and what else you’d like to see in future iOS14 widgets.
